desc.code: Proposed and developed a refactored build using modern tech for improved performance.
desc.design: Led the UI and UX design of the website, created sitemap wireframes, and functional prototypes.

desc.code: Developed a Unity game with a Qualtrics integration to collect interaction data.
desc.design: Designed the characters, revamped the environment, and polished UI elements to enhance user experience.

desc.code: Managed the git repository, resolved merge conflicts, and added new features.
desc.design: Designed 3D assets and UI elements, created a technical pipeline for the team, and provided feedback on assets.
Coordinated, produced, and sourced digital assets, helped author 2 optical installations, and styled a tooltip for publication.

desc.code: Created a game in 10 days with three other students from around the world during the Impact Jam hosted by Games for Change. Our project earned an honorable mention for the most creative concept.

desc.design: For a wedding, I created an animated short story. I also produced 50 personalized interactive videos for guests. These videos were triggered live as guests 'wrote' their invitation cards, known as a Kankotri.

I designed an eco-friendly packaging system for six lampshades, available in two sizes. Inspired by origami, the entire package is made solely from cardboard. The outer structure encases the lampshades, while an inner form provides cushioning and protection.
